verses.verse: In the <S%H8141>year<s%> that <S%H8661>Tartan<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> unto <S%H795>Ashdod<s%>, when <S%H5623>Sargon<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H3898>him<s%>, and he fought against <S%H795>Ashdod<s%> and took <S%H3920>it<s%>;

at that <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H531>Amoz<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%>, and <S%H6605>loose<s%> the <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> from off thy <S%H4975>loins<s%>, and put thy <S%H5275>shoe<s%> from <S%H2502>off<s%> thy <S%H7272>foot<s%>. And he did <S%H6213>so<s%>, <S%H1980>walking<s%> <S%H6174>naked<s%> and <S%H3182>barefoot<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Like as my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> hath <S%H1980>walked<s%> <S%H6174>naked<s%> and <S%H3182>barefoot<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> for a <S%H226>sign<s%> and a <S%H4159>wonder<s%> concerning <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and concerning <S%H3568>Ethiopia<s%>;

so shall the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> lead <S%H5090>away<s%> the <S%H7628>captives<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and the <S%H1546>exiles<s%> of <S%H3568>Ethiopia<s%>, <S%H5288>young<s%> and <S%H2205>old<s%>, <S%H6174>naked<s%> and <S%H3182>barefoot<s%>, and with <S%H8357>buttocks<s%> <S%H2834>uncovered<s%>, to the <S%H6172>shame<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.
And they shall be <S%H2865>dismayed<s%> and <S%H954>confounded<s%>, because of <S%H3568>Ethiopia<s%> their <S%H4007>expectation<s%>, and of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> their <S%H8597>glory<s%>.

And the <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of this <S%H339>coast-land<s%> shall <S%H559>say<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H3541>Behold<s%>, such is our <S%H4007>expectation<s%>, whither we <S%H5127>fled<s%> for <S%H5833>help<s%> to be <S%H5337>delivered<s%> <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>: and <S%H4422>we<s%>, how shall we escape?
